name: Trail to Terranova (Ruchita Kondvilkar)
description:
Trail to Terranova is made with classic inspirations such as Oregon Trail and Space Invaders. The game was made in a 52 hour Jam, The Train Jam 2018 with a bunch of talented people. 

The overall idea of the game is a colony is trying to travel to a distant planet called Terranova. In order to survive the journey be sure to stock up on rations and fuel. To interact with the planets make sure to just run into them.
